2@20.body:
> [p2p](#comment_13_62): p2p: But pls consider implementing another kind of  "Tor support"--support to use Tor as a SOCKS5 proxy. It is not used to run hidden service, but to setup a site anonymously and let other people access it ( store it ) without Tor. 

Just added socks proxy + http tracker support, looks like everything is working well using Tor. If no other problem found i'm going to publish it in next days.

> [p2p](#comment_14_62): THX！Is it OK to start a new site like ZeroTalk using Tor, and other people without Tor can register & post?

Anyone outside from Tor network can't connect to Tor peers, so its not possible. Socks proxy support only allow you to browse zeronet content, but you can't create new sites using it.

> [p2p](#comment_15_62): In Twister we can use Tor as SOCKS proxy to read & post, can send private messages to clearnet nodes.  

You can also read and post using zeronet & tor, but creating new sites is not possible.
